= Documentation =

== Functions ==

=== pass() ===

As its name implies, this function does nothing. Its purpose is to be used as a default function in place where a continuation may be undefined.

{{{
function continue_this (maybe_undefined) {
    (maybe_undefined || pass)(some, argument);
}
}}}

If anything, its application stands as a reminder of how much Lisp there is in [http://www.crockford.com/javascript/javascript.html JavaScript].
